SEARCH
Package Transactions

Class Receipt

java.lang.Object
Transactions.Receipt
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonIdentifiable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscountReceipt
public class Receipt extends Object implements JsonIdentifiable
The Receipt class represents a receipt in a retail system. It includes details about the customer, payment, cash register, transactions, tax, change given, and receipt ID.

    Constructs a new Receipt with the specified name, payment, cash register, and transactions.

      Constructs a new Receipt with the specified name, payment, cash register, and transactions.
      Parameters:
      name - the name on the receipt
      payment - the payment for the receipt
      cashRegister - the cash register where the receipt was processed
      transactions - the transactions on the receipt
